INTO ProjectMember (projectSeq, empno) VALUES (project_seq.CURRVAL, #{member.empno})

mapper.select: SELECT pm.projectseq,pm.empno,p.deptno,p.deptname,p.membername,p.projectname,p.projectdescription,sub.membercount FROM projectMember pm JOIN project p ON pm.projectseq = p.projectseq JOIN (SELECT projectseq, COUNT(*) AS membercount FROM projectMember GROUP BY projectseq) sub ON pm.projectseq = sub.projectseq WHERE pm.empno = #{empno} GROUP BY pm.projectseq,pm.empno,p.deptno,p.deptname,p.membername, p.projectname, p.projectdescription, sub.membercount
